content:
During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 6 areas of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisreportedGeneral Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

At the same time, the missile troops caused 2 areas of concentration of the enemy's personnel.

It will be recalled that tonight the Defense ForcesDestroyed14 out of 16 enemy UAVs, all in the Odesa region. Anti-aircraft missile units of the Air Force and Ground Forces, mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the air attack.

As reportedArmyinform, Russia's troops storm the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces in seven directions, more than 60 battles per day.
title: Aviation of the Defense Forces carried out six strikes on the enemy during the day
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.    At the same time, units of the missile forces...
author: Army Inform
